channel.title: Ned some serious help! Please!
channel.description: I need help on:- Changing the main menu (when u log on it shows u a menu) Some NPCs are saying "thug life is offline!" i want to change that to my name. - Fixed Starter.. I've made my own starter but there is already one.. i dont no how to delete it. Change The starting items.. Please Help! :(

item.title: Ned some serious help! Please!
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

To change the starting items open ‘player.java’ and search for //Giving the player an unique look

then beneath that you should get something like this… playerEquipment[playerHat]=1038; playerEquipment[playerCape]=6568; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=1035; playerEquipment[playerShield]=1187; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=1033; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1; playerEquipment[playerRing]=6735; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

just change the item ID’s… e.g. playerEquipment[playerLegs]=1033; change the 1033 for a different shild!

Read full topic
